name: Alumina silicata

Head: Constriction of scalp
Swelling and ulceration of nose
Frequent coryzas
Pain in head, better heat, perspires
Pain in eyes, flickering
Congestion of brain
Respiratory: Feeling of great weakness in chest
Catarrh of chest, pain, raw feeling
Spasmodic cough with purulent viscid expectoration
Skin: Formication along course of nerves, veins feel full and distended
Extremities: Heaviness, jerking, numbness, aching and pains

details: Deep acting remedy for chronic complaints of brain, spine and nerves. Constriction is a marked general symptom, also constriction of orifices. Venous distention. Weakness, especially spinal. Aching and burning in spine. Formication, numbness, pain in all limbs. Epileptiform convulsion. Coldness during pains.Seems to be the same as Kaolin - Bolus alba (China Clay) Alumina Silicate: A remedy for croup and bronchitis. Nose itching and burning. Discharge YELLOW. SORE, SCABBY, stopped up. SORENESS OF CHEST along trachea; cannot stand percussion. Gray sputa. Capillary bronchitis. Larynx and chest sore. Membranous croup - extends down trachea.
